channel.title: DAMIRCHE CA LLC
channel.description: Recent content on DAMIRCHE CA LLC

item.title: Products
item.description:
MyPhone Vision — Bring Your Phone into Vision.

VlogMonitor — See yourself on iPad while filming yourself on your Phone’s rear camera.

MyPhone — Use this app to stream your phone’s screen to AR/VR headsets headset.

DarkSpace — Custom Home with nothing inside, only emptiness of Dark Space.

item.title: How to mirror iPhone to iPad?
item.description: TLDR: use VlogMonitor, because it is the simplest solution.

Privacy Policy

This privacy policy applies to the BigScrubber app (hereby referred to as “Application”) for mobile devices that was created by DAMIRCHE CA LLC (hereby referred to as “Service Provider”) as a Commercial service. This service is intended for use “AS IS”.

Information Collection and Use

The Application collects information when you download and use it. This information may include information such as

  • Your device’s Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address)
  • The pages of the Application that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages
  • The time spent on the Application
  • The operating system you use on your mobile device

The Application does not gather precise information about the location of your mobile device.

Privacy Policy

This privacy policy applies to the Megafn = Amplifier × Effects app (hereby referred to as “Application”) for mobile devices that was created by DAMIRCHE CA LLC (hereby referred to as “Service Provider”) as a Commercial service. This service is intended for use “AS IS”.

Information Collection and Use

The Application collects information when you download and use it. This information may include information such as

  • Your device’s Internet Protocol address (e.g. IP address)
  • The pages of the Application that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages
  • The time spent on the Application
  • The operating system you use on your mobile device

The Application does not gather precise information about the location of your mobile device.

item.title: DarkSpace VR Home is available!

item.title: Contact
item.description:
If you have any questions, feel free to reach out using the information below.

Email: rdamir@damirche.com

item.title: Dark Space
item.description:
Install via SideQuest

DarkSpace is a virtual home environment completely free of distractions. It features just you and your screens, making it ideal for focusing on content.

Available for the Quest series of AR/VR headsets.

item.title: Support
